verses.verse: (A Mikhtam of David.) Preserve <S%H8104><s%> me, O God, <S%H410><s%> for I take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Thee.
I said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Thou art my Lord; <S%H136><s%> I have no <S%H1077><s%> good <S%H9186><s%> besides <S%H5921><s%> Thee."
As for the saints <S%H6918><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in the earth, <S%H776><s%> They are the majestic <S%H117><s%> ones <S%H117><s%> in whom is all <S%H3605><s%> my delight. <S%H2656><s%>

The sorrows <S%H6094><s%> of those who have bartered <S%H4117><s%> for another <S%H312><s%> [god] will be multiplied; <S%H7235><s%> I shall not pour <S%H5258><s%> out their libations <S%H5262><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> Nor <S%H1077><s%> shall I take <S%H5375><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> upon my lips. <S%H8193><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the portion <S%H4521><s%> of my inheritance <S%H2506><s%> and my cup; <S%H3563><s%> Thou dost support <S%H8551><s%> my lot. <S%H1486><s%>
The lines <S%H9112><s%> have fallen <S%H5307><s%> to me in pleasant <S%H5273><s%> places; Indeed, <S%H637><s%> my heritage <S%H5159><s%> is beautiful <S%H9629><s%> to me.
I will bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has counseled <S%H3289><s%> me; Indeed, <S%H637><s%> my mind <S%H3629><s%> instructs <S%H3256><s%> me in the night. <S%H3915><s%>

I have set <S%H7737><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me; Because <S%H3588><s%> He is at my right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> I will not be shaken. <S%H4131><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> is glad, <S%H8055><s%> and my glory <S%H9202><s%> rejoices; <S%H1523><s%> My flesh <S%H1320><s%> also <S%H637><s%> will dwell <S%H7931><s%> securely. <S%H983><s%>

For Thou wilt not abandon <S%H5800><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> to Sheol; <S%H7585><s%> Neither <S%H3808><s%> wilt Thou allow <S%H5414><s%> Thy Holy <S%H2623><s%> One <S%H2623><s%> to undergo <S%H7845><s%> decay. <S%H7845><s%>

Thou wilt make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to me the path <S%H734><s%> of life; <S%H9132><s%> In Thy presence <S%H6440><s%> is fulness <S%H7648><s%> of joy; <S%H8057><s%> In Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> there are pleasures <S%H5273><s%> forever. <S%H5331><s%>
